name: InsideMedicalAssisting
0:
”Alexa, open Inside Medical Assisting”
”Alexa, start Inside Medical Assisting”
”Alexa, ask Inside Medical Assisting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inside medical assisting
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Podcast will examine Medical Assisting from numerous areas of expertise and professions that are interconnected and interdependent.

We will look into the medical assisting profession and medical assistant from different points of view.
Each point of view, having its own purpose, agenda, motivation, perspective and impact.

Consider, The Voice of Medical Assisting Podcast as a talking book and each podcast is a chapter, where you can listen to the insightful knowledge, experience, advice and wisdom of others at your own convenience.
Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands: **Next/Previous Episode** — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next” — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous” **Select Latest Episode** — “Alexa, ask Inside Medical Assisting to play latest episode” **Select First Episode** — “Alexa, ask Inside Medical Assisting to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
